name: Neil
description: A key character in 'Tenet', portrayed by Robert Pattinson.

content.title: Background
content.body: Neil is a mysterious and intelligent operative who works alongside the Protagonist to prevent World War III. Not much is known about his past, but it is hinted that he has a deep understanding of time inversion technology.

content.title: Personality
content.body: Neil is portrayed as charming, witty, and intelligent. He is extremely loyal to the Protagonist and demonstrates a strong sense of duty towards their mission. Despite his laid-back demeanor, Neil is highly perceptive and skilled in combat and espionage.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: Neil serves as the Protagonist's primary ally throughout the film 'Tenet'. He assists in various missions related to preventing a catastrophic future event. As the story unfolds, it becomes clear that Neil has known the Protagonist for a long time, due to their encounters across time. His arc concludes with a heroic sacrifice, revealing he knows his fate due to the temporal nature of their mission.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: Neil shares a deep bond with the Protagonist, suggesting a long-standing friendship that transcends time. He also has working relationships with several operatives involved in the 'Tenet' mission, though these are not explored in detail.

content.title: Abilities
content.body: Neil possesses extensive knowledge of time inversion technology, combat skills, and tactical expertise. He is also fluent in multiple languages and skilled in infiltration and reconnaissance.
